entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
